oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.conf

Interface InputDataSetConfigurator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSetConfigurator<AbstractInputDataSet>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileInputDataSetConfigurator, FileInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, FileInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, MultiInputDataSetConfigurator, MultiInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, MultiInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, NoSQLInputDataSetConfigurator, NoSQLInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, NoSQLInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, SimpleInputDataSetConfigurator, SimpleInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, SimpleInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, SpatialIndexInputDataSetConfigurator, SpatialIndexInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl, SpatialIndexInputDataSetConfiguratorImpl

    public interface InputDataSetConfigurator
extends DataSetConfigurator<AbstractInputDataSet>
    Defines the interface for a configurator of input data sets.
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Class<?> getBaseInputFormatClass()
      Gets the InputFormat super class supported by this configurator.

      • Methods inherited from interface oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.data.conf.DataSetConfigurator

        acceptsDataSet, configure

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseInputFormatClass

        java.lang.Class<?> getBaseInputFormatClass()
        Gets the InputFormat super class supported by this configurator. Input data sets's input formats are expected to be the same type or a sub type of the class returned by this method.
        Returns:
        an InputFormat class of either, the old or new Hadoop API depending on the concrete implementation.
